# hdrGainMapImage

**Type Property**

An optional key and value to save a gain map channel to a JPEG or HEIF.

## Declaration

```swift
static let hdrGainMapImage: CIImageRepresentationOption
```

## Discussion

The value for this key needs to be a monochrome [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] instance.

If the [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImageRepresentationOption/hdrGainMapAsRGB] option it true, then it needs to be an RGB [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] instance.

The `/CIImage/properties` should contain metadata information equivalent to what is returned when initializing an image using [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImageOption/auxiliaryHDRGainMap].
